Text:
Thanks for uploading, but Movie quality is very low. Too many artifacts in videotrack. Menus in this release also not good: too heavy (695Mb), and simple, and looks like bullshit.
Metropolis with better quality (LDRip, DVD  3.5 GB), i found on the tracker m.o.n.o.v.a...o.r.g (it's not advertising).
Hopefully the new version "Giorgio Moroder Presents Metropolis: Special Edition [Blu-ray]" to be released on Nov 15 will be great quality and someone will post it.
